page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Some pupils of the Laira Green Primary School were asked whether or not their fathers worked ? If so, What did they do ? Only 15% of the fathers did not work and the main employers were the dockyard with 24.4%. The other types of employment are listed below.
Sailors 9.4% Taxidrivers 7.4% Railway men 3.7% Marine projects 3.7% Gas board 3.7% Fishermen 3.7% Insurance agent, making magazines, decoraters, farmers, timber yard, soldiers, factory workers, Devon County Council, painters, security guards, British Telecom, chefs, alarms, make kitchens, play in a band were all 1.8%
